        Returns:

      • SetCache

        public boolean SetCache(java.lang.String path)
        set cache file to PDF.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to save some temporary data, compressed images and so on
        Returns:
        true or false

      • Open

        public int Open(java.lang.String path,
       java.lang.String password)
        open document.
        first time, SDK try password as user password, and then try password as owner password.
        Parameters:
        path - PDF file to be open.
        password - password or null.
        Returns:
        error code:
        0:succeeded, and continue
        -1:need input password
        -2:unknown encryption
        -3:damaged or invalid format
        -10:access denied or invalid file path
        others:unknown error

      • OpenMem

        public int OpenMem(byte[] data,
          java.lang.String password)
        open document in memory. first time, SDK try password as user password, and then try password as owner password.
        Parameters:
        data - data for whole PDF file in byte array. developers should retain array data, till document closed.
        password - password or null.
        Returns:
        error code:
        0:succeeded, and continue
        -1:need input password
        -2:unknown encryption
        -3:damaged or invalid format
        -10:access denied or invalid file path
        others:unknown error

      • OpenStream

        public int OpenStream(Document.PDFStream stream,
             java.lang.String password)
        open document from stream. first time, SDK try password as user password, and then try password as owner password.
        Parameters:
        stream - PDFStream object.
        password - password or null.
        Returns:
        error code:
        0:succeeded, and continue
        -1:need input password
        -2:unknown encryption
        -3:damaged or invalid format
        -10:access denied or invalid file path
        others:unknown error

      • GetPermission

        public int GetPermission()
        get permission of PDF, this value defined in PDF reference 1.7
        bit 1-2 reserved
        bit 3(0x4) print
        bit 4(0x8) modify
        bit 5(0x10) extract text or image
        others: see PDF reference
        Returns:
        permission flags

      • GetPerm

        public int GetPerm()
        get permission of PDF, this value defined in "Perm" entry in Catalog object
        Returns:
        0 means not defined
        1 means can't modify
        2 means can modify some form fields
        3 means can do any modify

      • Close

        public void Close()
        close the document.

        get a Page object for page NO.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Page object

      • GetMeta

        public java.lang.String GetMeta(java.lang.String tag)
        get meta data for document.
        Parameters:
        tag - Predefined values:"Title", "Author", "Subject", "Keywords", "Creator", "Producer", "CreationDate", "ModDate".
        or you can pass any key that self-defined.
        Returns:
        Meta string value, or null.

      • SetMeta

        public boolean SetMeta(java.lang.String tag,
              java.lang.String val)
        set meta data for document.
        this method valid only in premium version.
        Parameters:
        tag - Predefined values:"Title", "Author", "Subject", "Keywords", "Creator", "Producer", "CreationDate", "ModDate".
        or you can pass any key that self-defined.
        val - string value.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • GetOutlines

        public Document.Outline GetOutlines()
        get root outline item.
        Returns:
        handle value of first root outline item. or 0 if no outlines.

        save as the document to another file. it remove any security information.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true or false.

      • NewRootOutline

        public boolean NewRootOutline(java.lang.String label,
                     int pageno,
                     float top)
        new a root outline to document, it insert first root outline to Document.
        the old first root outline, shall be next of this outline.
        Parameters:
        label - label to display
        pageno - pageno to jump
        top - y position in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false

      • NewPage

        public Page NewPage(int pageno,
           float w,
           float h)
        insert a page to Document
        if pagheno >= page_count, it do same as append.
        otherwise, insert to pageno.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        w - page width in PDF coordinate
        h - page height in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        Page object or null means failed.

      • RemovePage

        public boolean RemovePage(int pageno)
        remove page by page NO.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • NewFontCID

        public Document.DocFont NewFontCID(java.lang.String font_name,
                          int style)
        create a font object, used to write texts.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        font_name -
        font name exists in font list.
        using Global.getFaceCount(), Global.getFaceName() to enumerate fonts.
        style -
        (style&1) means bold,
        (style&2) means Italic,
        (style&8) means embed,
        (style&16) means vertical writing, mostly used in Asia fonts.
        Returns:
        DocFont object or null is failed.

      • NewGState

        public Document.DocGState NewGState()
        create a ExtGraphicState object, used to set alpha values.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Returns:
        DocGState object or null.

      • NewImage

        public Document.DocImage NewImage(Bitmap bmp,
                         boolean has_alpha)
        create an image from Bitmap object.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap object in ARGB_8888 format.
        has_alpha - generate alpha channel information?
        Returns:
        DocImage object or null.

      • NewImageJPEG

        public Document.DocImage NewImageJPEG(java.lang.String path)
        create an image from JPEG/JPG file.
        supported image color space:
        --GRAY
        --RGB
        --CMYK
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        path - path to JPEG file.
        Returns:
        DocImage object or null.

      • NewImageJPX

        public Document.DocImage NewImageJPX(java.lang.String path)
        create an image from JPX/JPEG 2k file.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        path - path to JPX file.
        Returns:
        DocImage object or null.

      • ChangePageRect

        public boolean ChangePageRect(int pageno,
                     float dl,
                     float dt,
                     float dr,
                     float db)
        change page rect.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        dl - delta to left, page_left += dl;
        dt - delta to top, page_top += dt;
        dr - delta to right, page_right += dr;
        db - delta to bottom, page_bottom += db;
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • SetPageRotate

        public boolean SetPageRotate(int pageno,
                    int degree)
        set page rotate.
        a premium license is needed for this method.
        Parameters:
        pageno - 0 based page NO.
        degree - rotate angle in degree, must be 90 * n.
        Returns:
        true or false
